page.title: 09Transport-Letham.>
page.content: In the village only 9 people regularly use the bus service. Almost 3 quarters of the population own a car. Letham is close to Dundee, Cuper, Glenrothes and Kirkcaldy as it lies just off the busy A914. Buses travelling between Cupar and Glenrothes stop at the bus shelter. There are ten buses on week days and 8 on Saturdays. On Sunday there is no bus service. 2 buses travelling between Kirkcaldy and Dundee stop at Letham Toll on Saturday only. Buses are unable to travel via Monimail due to a low bridge at Collessie. The nearest railway stations are at Cupar and Ladybank.
